EvolutionAlgorithmRunner
IDisposable
public sealed
EvolutionAlgorithmRunner

Wraps a background worker thread for running an IEvolutionAlgorithm, and provides methods for asynchronous control of the worker thread, for starting, stopping, pausing and resuming the evolution algorithm.

Functions
StartOrResume
public void StartOrResume()

Starts the algorithm running, or resumes a paused algorithm.

This method can be called when the runner is in either the Ready or Paused states.  If the runner is in the Paused state, then the runner is resumed.  If the runner is already in the Running state, then the method does nothing and returns (and logs a warning).  For all other states an exception is thrown.

RequestPause
public void RequestPause()

Requests that the runner pauses, but doesn't wait it to do so.

The runner will pause once the worker thread completes execution of the current generation.  However, this method returns immediately and does not wait for the worker thread to stop.

RequestPauseAndWait
public void RequestPauseAndWait()

Request that the runner pauses, and waits it to do so.

The runner will pause once the worker thread completes execution of the current generation.  This method will block and wait for the worker thread to stop before returning.

RequestTerminateAndWait
public void RequestTerminateAndWait()

Request that the runner terminates, and waits it to do so.

The runner will stop once the worker thread completes execution of the current generation.  This method will block and wait for the worker thread to stop before returning.

public void Dispose()
